fields.name: Custom Flying V Snowboard
fields.desc: Since its humble beginnings, innovation has defined the Burton Custom series and set it apart as the most popular, versatile, and mimicked board in snowboarding. These days, the one-board answer to all terrain adds exclusive ingredients like Carbon Highlights and Squeezebox core profiling to the mix for drastic weight-savings, crisper pop and, and deluxe handling to pilot through the mountain’s mixed bag. The precision and stability of camber is the top choice for pros like Mikkel Bang, while Flying V™ combines camber’s power with the relaxed float of rocker for the best of both worlds.

fields.name: METHOD JACKET
fields.desc: Classic fit, Insulated, 5k/5k fabric tech, Critically seam sealed, Fixed powder skirt, Goggle pocket YKK VislonTM zip to centre front.

fields.name: Dancing Shoes
fields.desc: This is a pair of dancing shoes by Marc Jacobs. They are made of leather and have a metallic shine. Michael Jackson would've loved these shoes.
